title: Introduction to Jupyter Notebooks
subtitle: Shareable coding
brief: A very brief description of the course. It should not extend the card for aesthetic reasons.
objectives: become informed about what this introduction is about
prerequisites: A reasonably recent version of Jupyter and JupyterLab, which is installed as part of the Conda environment for CodeRefinery workshops.
Optional (we only demonstrate this): A reasonably recent version of Git to be able to work with the JupyterLab Git integration.
